original_title: 本当にあった呪いの映像〜怨〜
overview: The third installment from the popular series "Really Curse Video". The spirits around you evoke the fear of hell! In the videos shot at special events such as graduation ceremonies and festivals, there are bloody and horrible grudges. All 14 posted videos are the entrance to a dangerous other world...
title: Real Curse Video: Grudge
